{{cpp/container/stack/title|top}}
{{cpp/container/stack/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|
reference top();
}}
{{dcl|num=2|
const_reference top() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns reference to the top element in the stack. This is the most recently pushed element. This element will be removed on a call to {{lc|pop()}}. Equivalent to: {{box|{{rlpt|/#Member objects|c}}{{c/core|.back()}}}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reference to the last element.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;stack&gt;

void reportStackSize(const std::stack&lt;int&gt;&amp; s)
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s.size() &lt;&lt; " elements on stack\n";
}

void reportStackTop(const std::stack&lt;int&gt;&amp; s)
{
    // Leaves element on stack
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Top element: " &lt;&lt; s.top() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
 
int main()
{
    std::stack&lt;int&gt; s;
    s.push(2);
    s.push(6);
    s.push(51);
    
    reportStackSize(s);
    reportStackTop(s);
    
    reportStackSize(s);
    s.pop();
    
    reportStackSize(s);
    reportStackTop(s);
}
|output=
3 elements on stack
Top element: 51
3 elements on stack
2 elements on stack
Top element: 6
}}
